diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Ectopic Focus in an Accessory Left Atrial Appendage
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by imaging studies that confirmed the presence of an accessory LA appendage, which was found to be the source of the ectopic beats contributing to the patient's refractory atrial fibrillation. Ablation of the appendage orifice resulted in cessation of the arrhythmia.
